user_question: What is the title of module 1?

knowledge_chain.raw_result:
The title of Module 1 is **"Basic flat & layered maps."** This module is part of the workshop titled "Map making workshop from Wikidata to interactive off-Wiki maps." 

### References
- [1] 52b3137455e7ca4df65021a200aef724.pdf
